title: [UPDATE+ JAPANESE] MORE INCIDENTS PACK
desc:
[h1]MORE INCIDENTS PACK[/h1]

If you want to talk about mods up to 112 Operator, join the server!
https://discord.gg/rhx89rX
Steam group: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/112operatormods
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Rescue-Mod-Team-639486566692532

[img]https://i.imgur.com/5EFfZ8A.gif[/img]

There are as many as [b]110[/b] new incidents in mod.
They are diverse (serious or trifling)
Incidents for any events and weather (e.g. hot weather or concert)
Many more fires
Icons that add realism
Professionally made

List of incidents on the discord.

In subsequent updates there will be many more incidents and will be much more varied. I will also add calls, but this is at a later stage of mods. You can write suggestions for incidents and future calls in the comments. If you notice any errors in the translation, write it!

[b]Translations:[/b]
Polish, 
English,
Chinese- Thanks, LilyBageL!
Korean- Thanks, 우리 더기는 아가야!
German- Thanks, DerFyhrer and Timist07!
French- Thanks, ViciousKoala!
Russian- Thanks, Doctor_Sheva !
Japanese- Thanks, nununu ! 

[b]In the comments, you can suggest a translation for a specific language or help me translate.[/b]

[b]Rescue Mod Team:[/b]
bartussx - management, scripting, ideas, vehicles, graphics, calls, hats
Hotler - translations, calls, ideas
Kijciwpempek - vehicles,ideas, calls, translations
LukizarAcodin - translations, calls
NapewnoNieMaks - calls
frytoslaw.pl - calls
